scripts.clean.build: for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.build; cd ../..; done
scripts.clean.dependencies: rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json yarn.lock && for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.dependencies; cd ../..; done
scripts.upgrade.packages: for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; spruce upgrade; cd ../..; done
scripts.upgrade.packages.workspaces: yarn && for d in packages/*; do cd $d; yarn-upgrade-all; cd ../..; done
scripts.upgrade.packages.all: yarn install && yarn upgrade.packages.workspaces && yarn upgrade.packages
scripts.upgrade.packages.test: yarn upgrade.packages.all && yarn lint && yarn build.dev && yarn test
